Package org.apache.avalon.util.factory.impl

The factory impl package provides a parameterized map implementation that can be used to simplfy the creation and management of factory criteria.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Criteria A abstract utility class that can be used to simplify the creation of domain specific criteria.
Parameter A parameter is an immutable class that contains a description of an allowable parameter within a crieria instance.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.util.factory.impl Description

The factory impl package provides a parameterized map implementation that can be used to simplfy the creation and management of factory criteria.
